description.plain:
Rebbeca Marie Gomez, nacida el 2 de marzo de 1997 y mejor conocida como Becky G, es una cantante, compositora, rapera y actriz mexicoamericana. Su estilo musical es una combinación de pop, rap, pop latino y urbano.

Obtuvo reconocimiento en 2011 después de publicar remixes y covers de canciones populares en YouTube. En 2014, Gomez ganó su primera entrada en el Billboard Hot 100 gracias a la canción “Shower”, alcanzando el 16º puesto en la lista. La canción también recibió la certificación de 2x multi-platino de la RIAA.

Becky G encontró más éxito cuando entró a la escena de música latina. Sus canciones “Mayores” con Bad Bunny y “Sin Pijama” con Natti Natasha consiguieron más de un mil millón de vistas en YouTube y por eso apareció otra vez en el Hot 100.

En 2019, Gomez lanzó su álbum debut muy esperado MALA SANTA, el cual cuenta con más colaboraciones con otras superestrellas de la escena latina como Farruko y Sech. En 2019 también participó en juntes de culturas como “Chicken Noodle Soup” junto a j-hope de BTS y “GIANTS” de True Damage, una canción tocada por primera vez durante la fase final del Campeonato Mundial de League of Legends.

  


[English]

Rebbeca Marie Gomez (born March 2, 1997), better known by her stage name Becky G, is a Mexican-American singer, songwriter, rapper, and actress. Her musical style is an integration of pop, rap, Latin pop and urban genres.

She gained recognition in 2011 after she posted several videos of herself performing remixes and covers of popular songs on YouTube. In 2014, Gomez had her first Billboard Hot 100 entry, with “Shower”, peaking at No. 16. The song also received a 2x multi-platinum certification from the RIAA.

Becky G became even more successful when she stepped into the Latin music scene. Her songs “Mayores” with Bad Bunny and “Sin Pijama” with Natti Natasha both garnered over one billion views on YouTube and once again caused her to appear in the Hot 100.

In 2019, Gomez released her highly anticipated debut album titled MALA SANTA, a Spanish language album containing more collaborations with other Latin superstars such as Farruko and Sech. During 2019, she also participated in multicultural collaborations such as “Chicken Noodle Soup” with j-hope of BTS and True Damage’s “GIANTS”, a song premiered during the League of Legends World Championship Finals.

[English]

Rebbeca Marie Gomez (born March 2, 1997), better known by her stage name Becky G, is a Mexican-American singer, songwriter, rapper, and actress. Her musical style is an integration of pop, rap, Latin pop and urban genres.

She gained recognition in 2011 after she posted several videos of herself performing remixes and covers of popular songs on YouTube. In 2014, Gomez had her first Billboard Hot 100 entry, with “Shower”, peaking at No. 16. The song also received a 2x multi-platinum certification from the RIAA.

Becky G became even more successful when she stepped into the Latin music scene. Her songs “Mayores” with Bad Bunny and “Sin Pijama” with Natti Natasha both garnered over one billion views on YouTube and once again caused her to appear in the Hot 100.

In 2019, Gomez released her highly anticipated debut album titled MALA SANTA, a Spanish language album containing more collaborations with other Latin superstars such as Farruko and Sech. During 2019, she also participated in multicultural collaborations such as “Chicken Noodle Soup” with j-hope of BTS and True Damage’s “GIANTS”, a song premiered during the League of Legends World Championship Finals.

songs.title: Shower

description.plain:
“Shower” is one of Becky G’s breakout hits, selling over 180,000 copies and amassing millions of views on YouTube and streams on Spotify. The song marked her first entrance on the Billboard Hot 100 list, debuting at No. 88 list and reaching No. 16 at its peak.

The song finds Becky singing about how amazing her partner makes her feel and describing the cliché of singing in her shower when she thinks about her lover.
